00017 #include "PacketOperator.h"

00020 struct AccumulateOperator {
00021 };
00022 
00024 template <> template <>
00025 inline void PacketOperator< AccumulateOperator >::
00026 write< uint32 >( const uint32& ) {
00027    position() += 4;
00028 }
00029 
00031 template <> template <>
00032 inline void PacketOperator< AccumulateOperator >::
00033 write< uint64 >( const uint64& ) {
00034    position() += 8;
00035 }
00036 
00038 template <> template <>
00039 inline void PacketOperator< AccumulateOperator >::
00040 write< bool >( const bool& ) {
00041    position() += 4;
00042 }
00043 
00045 template <> template <>
00046 inline void PacketOperator< AccumulateOperator >::
00047 write< MC2String >( const MC2String& value ) {
00048    position() += value.size() + 1;
00049 }
00050 
00052 template <> template <>
00053 inline void PacketOperator<>::
00054 read< bool >( bool& code ) {
00055    read< uint32 >( (uint32&)code );
00056 }
00057 
00059 template <> template <>
00060 inline void PacketOperator< Packet >::
00061 write< bool >( const bool& code ) {
00062    write< uint32 >( (bool)code );
00063 }
00064 
00068 template < typename T >
00069 struct AccumulateSize: private PacketOperator< AccumulateOperator > {
00071    AccumulateOperator Dummy;
00072 
00073    AccumulateSize( int& startPos ) :
00074       PacketOperator<AccumulateOperator>( Dummy, startPos )
00075    { }
00076 
00077    void operator()( const T& hitType );
00078 
00079    uint32 size() {
00080       return position();
00081    }
00082 };
